Windlord:

"But you're with us and while that happen I's my duty care that no 
one it's hurted, I promised that to Rodimus and "added the male"first 
we have to know where is she: inside or outside the base"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade: I'm not under Rodimus' command. At the most, he's a 
fellow

thinking

all
